name: @sensethenlove/loop-backwards
author: Sense Then Love
description: Loop an array backwards! Give loopBackwards() an array and a callback. On each iteration calback provides the current item, a splice function, and the current index. If the splice function is called the item is removed from the array. If the splice function is called & the current item is a DOM element the item is removed from the array & the item is removed from the DOM
